lines.text: Must we have all these things blaring at us - I start every day in a state of deep shock.
Oh yes of course, I'd forgotten. Once we're over 40 we're too old to have actual emotions. Our hormones pack up and go leaving our mouths making mindless, hysterical noises.
I would like not to be included in your statistics if you don't mind, my only immediate problem is the egg custard.
The world it seems is moving on. Progress they call it.
You never were very romantic, were you.
